meanings.sent1: The pep talk imboldened the team before the big game.
meanings.sent2: She imboldened herself to speak up during the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's imboldened spirit helped save the day.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun imboldened the flowers to bloom brightly.
meanings.sent5: The cheers from the crowd imboldened the performer to give her best.

meanings.definition: To give confidence or encouragement to.
meanings.sent1: His supportive words imboldened her to pursue her dreams.
meanings.sent2: The success of her first project imboldened her to take on more challenges.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected compliment imboldened him to try a new hobby.
meanings.sent4: The kind gesture imboldened her to pay it forward.
meanings.sent5: The positive feedback imboldened the students to aim higher.
